scripts.quickstart: concurrently "cross-env HTTP_PORT=3001 P2P_PORT=6001 yarn start" "sleep 2 && cross-env HTTP_PORT=3002 P2P_PORT=6002 PEERS=ws://localhost:6001 yarn start"
scripts.quickstart-solution: concurrently "cross-env HTTP_PORT=3001 P2P_PORT=6001 yarn start-solution" "sleep 2 && cross-env HTTP_PORT=3002 P2P_PORT=6002 PEERS=ws://localhost:6001 yarn start-solution"
